com.github.mmichaelis.hamcrest.nextdeed.reflect

Class ClassDeclaresConstructor<T extends Class<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher<T>
      • org.hamcrest.TypeSafeMatcher<T>
        • com.github.mmichaelis.hamcrest.nextdeed.reflect.ClassDeclaresConstructor<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the class to check
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Matcher<T>, SelfDescribing

    public class ClassDeclaresConstructor<T extends Class<?>>
extends TypeSafeMatcher<T>
    Validates that a class declares a constructor with the given parameters.
    Since:
    1.0.0
